the pandemic may have increased the the bargaining power of skilled workers, but has sadly decreased it for semi-skilled and unskilled workers in India. After being out of job for so long, a lot of manual workers, minimum pay workers in retail, etc are going back to jobs and even opting for ones with worse pay and working conditions because they have to pay bills! High Population is truly a problem for us.
